mapper.select: SELECT cn.id, ca.area, cn.name, cn.address, cn.latitude, cn.longitude, cn.has_3d AS has3d, cn.has_imax AS hasImax, cn.tel, GLength(LineStringFromWKB(LineString(point(#{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), pos))) len FROM cinema cn LEFT JOIN city_area ca ON cn.district_id = ca.id LEFT JOIN city c ON ca.city_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY len

SELECT cn.id, ca.area, cn.name, cn.address, cn.latitude, cn.longitude, cn.has_3d AS has3d, cn.has_imax AS hasImax, cn.tel, min(s.sale_price) AS minPrice, count(DISTINCT s.source) AS sourceCount, count(DISTINCT s.start_time) AS leftScreening FROM cinema cn LEFT JOIN city_area ca ON cn.district_id = ca.id LEFT JOIN city c ON ca.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN screening s ON cn.id = s.cinema_id WHERE c.id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND s.movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND to_days(s.show_date) = to_days(#{showDate,jdbcType=DATE}) GROUP BY cn.id
SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM movieshowing m LEFT JOIN screening s ON s.movie_id = m.id WHERE s.cinema_id = #{cinemaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
